name: Ci·ne·ma·graph
bio: An image that contains within itself a living moment - that allows a glimpse of time to be experienced and preserved endlessly.

name: Mimi Ace
bio: Limitless undying love which shines around me like a million suns, it calls me on and on, across the universe.

name: Isaac Banner
bio: I ran back to that hollow again - the moon was just a sliver back then - and i ached for my heart like some tin man. When it came, oh it beat and it boiled and it rang...oh, it's ringing
